name: Tooploox
description:
Tooploox is a software development company that provides state-of-the-art solutions for startups and enterprises.
We focus on long-term partnerships and products that make people’s lives better.
 
The team behind the company consists of passionate T-shaped people from across the country, each being an expert in their respective domain, while – at the same time – being able to wear multiple hats as needed. This allows Tooploox to build beautiful, yet sophisticated solutions that cross disciplines, all done in a fully transparent, interactive and agile way.
While originally a mobile workshop, Tooploox quickly grew as a company of over a hundred people and has since embraced and encompassed more fields of software engineering.
The current lineup of competencies, apart from mobile, includes front-end and back-end development, advanced AI, as well as Blockchain and Robotics solutions.
Tooploox works closely with companies and grows organically with them.
